00001 #include "EventChecker.hh"

00003 #include "lcio.h"
00004 #include "EVENT/LCCollection.h"

00007 #include "LabviewBlock.hh"

00010 namespace CALICE {
00011 
00012 EventChecker aEventChecker;
00013 
00014   EventChecker::EventChecker() : Processor("EventChecker") {
00015     _description = "Processor for checking the event builder";
00016 
00017    registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName",
00018                                "Name of the input collection of Labview raw data to be checked",
00019                                _inputColName,
00020                                std::string("LabviewData"));
00021 
00022   }
00023 
00024 
00025   EventChecker::~EventChecker() {}
00026 
00027   void EventChecker::init() {}
00028 
00029   void EventChecker::processEvent(LCEvent* evt){
00030 
00031     try {
00032       //fetch Labview data raw collection
00033       LCCollection* col = evt->getCollection( _inputColName ) ;
00034       
00035       //count elements in ChipID 129:0, 130:1, ... 144:15
00036       //init to 0.
00037       int counter[16]; 
00038       for (int i = 0; i<16;i++){
00039         counter[i]=0;
00040       }
00041       
00042       //check all the ChipID, each one has 36 channels, 
00043       for (unsigned int ielm=0; ielm < static_cast<unsigned int>(col->getNumberOfElements()); ielm++) {
00044 
00045         //LCObject *obj = col->getElementAt(ielm);
00046         //LabviewBlock lBlock(obj);
00047         LabviewBlock lBlock( (col->getElementAt(ielm)) );
00048         
00049         
00050         //Change the ChipID [129,144] into CID [0,15]; 
00051         //i.e 129->0, 130->1, ... 144->15
00052         int CID = lBlock.GetChipID() - 129; 
00053         
00054         counter[CID]++;
00055           
00056       }
00057       
00058       for (int i = 0; i<16;i++){
00059         if( counter[i] > 0 && counter[i] != 36 ){
00060           std::cout<<"Event number: "<< evt->getEventNumber()
00061                    <<"     ChipID: "      << (i+129) //Print in ChipID number, i.e. 0->129, 1->130, ... 15->144
00062                    <<"     Entries: "     << counter[i]
00063                    <<std::endl;
00064           return;
00065         }
00066       }
00067     
00068 
00069 
00070 
00071     } catch (  lcio::DataNotAvailableException &err ) {
00072       err.what();
00073       return;
00074     }
00075     
00076 
00077    }
00078   
00079   void EventChecker::end()
00080   {}
00081   
00082 }
